Description.Name: AC/2 Ammo (XL)
Description.Details: This larger, heavier and more space efficient container packs more ammo in the same space. Ammo Bins will explode and damage their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Ammo bins contain 60 rounds of ammunition per ton. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the middle of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present. Explosion damage per ammo: 1.875
